# predicate

**Instance Property**

The predicate to match contacts against.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var predicate: NSPredicate? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set the value of this property to `nil` to match all contacts or use the search predicates in [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContact]. Compound predicates are not supported.
title: predicate
